name: DINO RUSH (Moracus)
description:
This is pretty much a replica of  classic chrome  dinosaur game. I think it's a great time kiler and i had fun making it. I hope you enjoy playing it as well.

HOW TO PLAY?

you basically need to avoid any obstacles that comes in dino's way. 

on windows:- you can use either spaxe-bar, up arrow key or  mouse clicks to jump.

on android :- Just touch anywhere on the screen to jump, touch again for double jump.

Note:- while installing the apk, you might get a popup sayin that source is not allowed, so just turn on "allow from this source", source can be whatever browser you're using.

DOUBLE JUMPS:- Dino can double jump only after completeing the first jump, that is on maximum height or on the way down.

CREDITS:-

  1. Forest art pack :-https://jesse-m.itch.io/jungle-pack
  2. Music by Quebesounds
  3.  font by https://caffinate.itch.io/bongo-8
  4. dino character sprite:- https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters
  5. Everything else :- https://www.youtube.com/@moracus (me)
